MVP
==========================

Inputs {.sidebar}
-------------------------

Explain what the award is

```{r, echo=FALSE}
inputPanel(
  selectInput("mvp_stat", label = "Statistic",
              choices = c("SLG", "AB", "R", "Vote_PTS", "BS_G", "BS_H", "BS_HR", "BS_BB", "OPS", "WAR", "BA", "OBP", "RBI", "SB"), selected = "SLG")
)
```


Column {data-width=300}
-------------------------

```{r, echo=FALSE}


renderPlot({
  stat_name <- switch(input$mvp_stat,
                      "SLG" = "SLG",
                      "AB" = "AB",
                      "R" = "R",
                      "Vote_PTS" = "Vote_PTS",
                      "BS_G" = "BS_G",
                      "BS_H" = "BS_H",
                      "BS_HR" = "BS_HR",
                      "BS_BB" = "BS_BB",
                      "OPS" = "OPS",
                      "WAR" = "WAR",
                      "BA" = "BA",
                      "OBP" = "OBP",
                      "RBI" = "RBI",
                      "SB" = "SB")
  
  mlb_mvp |>
    filter(Pitcher == FALSE) |>
    ggplot(aes(x = Year, y = as.numeric(case_when(
      input$mvp_stat == "SLG" ~ SLG,
      input$mvp_stat == "AB" ~ AB,
      input$mvp_stat == "R" ~ R,
      input$mvp_stat == "Vote_PTS" ~ Vote_PTS,
      input$mvp_stat == "BS_G" ~ BS_G,
      input$mvp_stat == "BS_H" ~ BS_H,
      input$mvp_stat == "BS_HR" ~ BS_HR,
      input$mvp_stat == "BS_BB" ~ BS_BB,
      input$mvp_stat == "OPS" ~ OPS,
      input$mvp_stat == "WAR" ~ WAR,
      input$mvp_stat == "BA" ~ BA,
      input$mvp_stat == "OBP" ~ OBP,
      input$mvp_stat == "RBI" ~ RBI,
      input$mvp_stat == "SB" ~ SB,
    )))) +
    geom_point() +
    geom_smooth(se = FALSE, color = "blue") +
    labs(y = stat_name)
})

```
